channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- DRYiCE MyXalytics
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- DRYiCE MyXalytics

item.title: CVE-2023-50342|2024-09-06T17:28:51.871Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20myxalytics
item.description: HCL DRYiCE MyXalytics is impacted by an Insecure Direct Object Reference (IDOR) vulnerability. Â A user can obtain certain details about another user as a result of improper access control.

item.title: CVE-2023-50347|2024-07-29T16:16:24.140Z -- hcl%20software -- dryice%20myxalytics
item.description: HCL DRYiCE MyXalytics is impacted by an insecure SQL interface vulnerability, potentially giving an attacker the ability to execute custom SQL queries. A malicious user can run arbitrary SQL commands including changing system configuration.

item.description: HCL DRYiCE MyXalytics is impacted by an insecure SQL interface vulnerability, potentially giving an attacker the ability to execute custom SQL queries. A malicious user can run arbitrary SQL commands including changing system configuration.
